Method Detail

askQuestion

java.lang.String askQuestion(java.lang.String question)
Displays a message that requires an answer.

Parameters:
question - - question that requires an answer
Returns:
String containing response to questions

display

void display(java.lang.String input)
Displays an input. The purpose of this method is to abstract TUI and GUI specific display methods within the code, and refer to any display function as display(). This increases readability, and only requires changes in display method to be changed in one place. The nature of the display will depend on the application.

displayGoodbye

void displayGoodbye()
Displays a goodbye message.

displayWelcome

void displayWelcome()
Displays a welcome message.

makeStatement

void makeStatement(java.lang.String statement)
Displays an informative message that does not require an answer.

Parameters:
statement - - statement to be displayed
